00087 #define rthal_local_irq_enable()        ipipe_unstall_pipeline_from(&rthal_domain)
00088 #define rthal_local_irq_save(x)         ((x) = !!ipipe_test_and_stall_pipeline_from(&rthal_domain))

00145 static inline unsigned long rthal_get_cpufreq(void)
00146 {
00147     struct ipipe_sysinfo sysinfo;
00148     rthal_get_sysinfo(&sysinfo);
00149     return (unsigned long)sysinfo.cpufreq;

00152 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00153 static int hdlr (unsigned event, struct ipipe_domain *ipd, void *data) \
00154 { \
00155     return do_##hdlr(event,ipd->domid,data); \
00156 }
00157 
00158 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SCHEDULE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00159 static int hdlr (unsigned event, struct ipipe_domain *ipd, void *data) \
00160 { \
00161     struct task_struct *p = (struct task_struct *)data; \
00162     do_##hdlr(p);                                       \
00163     return RTHAL_EVENT_PROPAGATE; \
00164 }
00165 
00166 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SETSCHED_EVENT(hdlr) \
00167 static int hdlr (unsigned event, struct ipipe_domain *ipd, void *data) \
00168 { \
00169     struct task_struct *p = (struct task_struct *)data; \
00170     do_##hdlr(p,p->rt_priority);                        \
00171     return RTHAL_EVENT_PROPAGATE; \
00172 }
00173 
00174 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SIGWAKE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00175 static int hdlr (unsigned event, struct ipipe_domain *ipd, void *data) \
00176 { \
00177     struct task_struct *p = (struct task_struct *)data; \
00178     do_##hdlr(p);                                       \
00179     return RTHAL_EVENT_PROPAGATE; \
00180 }
00181 
00182 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_EXIT_EVENT(hdlr) \
00183 static int hdlr (unsigned event, struct ipipe_domain *ipd, void *data) \
00184 { \
00185     struct task_struct *p = (struct task_struct *)data; \
00186     do_##hdlr(p);                                       \
00187     return RTHAL_EVENT_PROPAGATE; \
00188 }

00191     ipipe_catch_event(ipipe_root_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_EXIT,hdlr)
00192 #define rthal_catch_sigwake(hdlr)       \
00193     ipipe_catch_event(ipipe_root_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_SIGWAKE,hdlr)
00194 #define rthal_catch_schedule(hdlr)      \
00195     ipipe_catch_event(ipipe_root_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_SCHEDULE,hdlr)
00196 #define rthal_catch_setsched(hdlr)      \
00197     ipipe_catch_event(&rthal_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_SETSCHED,hdlr)
00198 #define rthal_catch_losyscall(hdlr)     \
00199     ipipe_catch_event(ipipe_root_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_SYSCALL,hdlr)
00200 #define rthal_catch_hisyscall(hdlr)     \
00201     ipipe_catch_event(&rthal_domain,IPIPE_EVENT_SYSCALL,hdlr)

00205 #define rthal_register_domain(_dom,_name,_id,_prio,_entry)      \
00206  ({     \
00207     struct ipipe_domain_attr attr; \
00208     ipipe_init_attr(&attr); \
00209     attr.name = _name;      \
00210     attr.entry = _entry;   \
00211     attr.domid = _id;       \
00212     attr.priority = _prio; \
00213     ipipe_register_domain(_dom,&attr); \
00214  })

00317 static inline unsigned long rthal_get_cpufreq(void)

00323 
00324 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00325 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00326 { \
00327     if (do_##hdlr((p)->event,(p)->domid,(p)->evdata) == RTHAL_EVENT_PROPAGATE)  \
00328         adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00329 }
00330 
00331 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SCHEDULE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00332 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00333 { \
00334     struct { \
00335         struct task_struct *prev; \
00336         struct task_struct *next; \
00337     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00338     do_##hdlr(ev->next);        \
00339     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00340 }
00341 
00342 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SETSCHED_EVENT(hdlr) \
00343 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00344 { \
00345     struct { \
00346         struct task_struct *task; \
00347         int policy; \
00348         struct sched_param *param; \
00349     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00350     do_##hdlr(ev->task,ev->param->sched_priority);      \
00351     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00352 }
00353 
00354 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SIGWAKE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00355 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00356 { \
00357     struct { \
00358         struct task_struct *task; \
00359     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00360     do_##hdlr(ev->task);        \
00361     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00362 }
00363 
00364 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_EXIT_EVENT(hdlr) \
00365 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00366 { \
00367     struct task_struct *task = (struct task_struct *)p->evdata; \
00368     do_##hdlr(task);    \
00369     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00370 }
00371 
00372 #define rthal_catch_taskexit(hdlr)      \
00373     adeos_catch_event_from(adp_root,ADEOS_EXIT_PROCESS,hdlr)
00374 #define rthal_catch_sigwake(hdlr)       \
00375     adeos_catch_event_from(adp_root,ADEOS_KICK_PROCESS,hdlr)
00376 #define rthal_catch_schedule(hdlr)      \
00377     adeos_catch_event_from(adp_root,ADEOS_SCHEDULE_HEAD,hdlr)
00378 #define rthal_catch_setsched(hdlr)      \
00379     adeos_catch_event_from(&rthal_domain,ADEOS_RENICE_PROCESS,hdlr)
00380 #define rthal_catch_losyscall(hdlr)     \
00381     adeos_catch_event_from(adp_root,ADEOS_SYSCALL_PROLOGUE,hdlr)
00382 #define rthal_catch_hisyscall(hdlr)     \
00383     adeos_catch_event_from(&rthal_domain,ADEOS_SYSCALL_PROLOGUE,hdlr)
00384 #define rthal_catch_exception(ex,hdlr)  \
00385     adeos_catch_event_from(&rthal_domain,ex,hdlr)

00388  ({     \
00389     adattr_t attr; \
00390     adeos_init_attr(&attr); \
00391     attr.name = _name;     \
00392     attr.entry = _entry;   \
00393     attr.domid = _id;      \
00394     attr.priority = _prio; \
00395     adeos_register_domain(_dom,&attr); \
00396  })

00400 #if !defined(CONFIG_ADEOS_NOTHREADS)
00401 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_DOMAIN(entry)     \
00402 void entry (int iflag)  \
00403 {                       \
00404     if (iflag)          \
00405         do_##entry();\
00406     for (;;)            \
00407         rthal_suspend_domain(); \
00408 }
00409 #else /* CONFIG_ADEOS_NOTHREADS */
00410 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_DOMAIN(entry)     \
00411 void entry (int iflag)  \
00412 {                       \
00413     do_##entry();       \
00414 }
00415 #endif /* !CONFIG_ADEOS_NOTHREADS */

00417 extern void rthal_domain_entry(int iflag);

00419 #endif /* !CONFIG_IPIPE */

00421 #define rthal_spin_lock_irq(lock) \
00422 do {  \
00423     rthal_local_irq_disable(); \
00424     rthal_spin_lock(lock); \
00425 } while(0)
00426 
00427 #define rthal_spin_unlock_irq(lock) \
00428 do {  \
00429     rthal_spin_unlock(lock); \
00430     rthal_local_irq_enable(); \
00431 } while(0)
00432 
00433 #define rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock,x) \
00434 do {  \
00435     rthal_local_irq_save(x); \
00436     rthal_spin_lock(lock); \
00437 } while(0)
00438 
00439 #define rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock,x) \
00440 do {  \
00441     rthal_spin_unlock(lock); \
00442     rthal_local_irq_restore(x); \
00443 } while(0)
